title: Whats going on with the servers ??
body:
Hey boys.

The servers seem to be down tried on 5 machines on 2 different internet connections including a 4g connection.

Why are the server status pages saying its up ? whats going on Riot ???

replies.body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/HR004jEX-could-not-connect-to-the-http-server# 

this has more info if you haven't seen it yet
my brother and i are experiencing the same problem. its not just you :/

Yeah something is definitely wrong. I haven't been able to connect for 3 hours and at first I thought it was Mac only, but it doesn't seem to be the case. On top of this, PSN is down so I'm kinda just gonna go sleep as my final resort......
